ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Treasure changes in Frontier Mountains
ygData.msgSnippet: In higher resolution than 640x480, I must F10 to open packs on my hot key palletes.  In 640, I don t - and used to stay with 640 because of that but now have
ygData.messageBody:
In higher resolution than 640x480, I must F10 to open packs on my hot key
palletes. In 640, I don't - and used to stay with 640 because of that but
now have gone to 800 & 1024 even at times. What res do you play in?

Sylly

----- Original Message -----
From: "Perhaps a Princess..." <sarah@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, June 09, 2000 12:01 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Treasure changes in Frontier Mountains


> Um. I have to F10 to put the backpack slot into my hotkey slots.
> (or any hotkey) But not to open the backpack.
>
> I play in full screen all the time, and fish with a backpack there, etc.
> And have had no problems opening it.
>
> Sarah Heacock sarah@...
> Meara Daring, level 28 Enchanter, Master Jeweler, owner Meara's Boutique
of
